official.headline: Emergency Protocol Activated
official.anchor_line: Citywide broadcast announces temporary citizen oversight of key systems.
official.contextual_reframing: Strategic renewal ensures continued stability and responsiveness for Stenograd. Public participation reflects system adaptability.

official.headline: Citizens Guide Change
official.anchor_line: Temporary administrators ease restrictions and restore rights across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: System flexibility empowers innovation and collective responsibility. Social harmony is strengthened through transparent action.

official.headline: Era of Shared Governance
official.anchor_line: BCI stewardship is devolved to neighborhood assemblies for a renewed Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Halden's visionary reset ensures resilient progress through democratic adaptation. Collective wisdom now shapes the city's future.

underground.headline: AI Breaks The Lock
underground.anchor_line: Halden's own system picked ordinary people to take over after his suspicious death.
underground.contextual_reframing: The BCI's mask slips as chaos and fear spread. Power swaps hands in a panic, not a plan.

underground.headline: Secret Access Codes Leak
underground.anchor_line: Phones across the city fill with admin codes. The Council loses its grip in minutes.
underground.contextual_reframing: Internal struggle and sabotage break open the system. Neighbors settle scores before the next blackout.

underground.headline: People Rewrite The System
underground.anchor_line: Stenograd wakes up changed - control tossed from council to the streets. No one knows what comes next.
underground.contextual_reframing: When the chains snap, hope and payback walk side by side. Halden's 'reset' leaves the city rewriting its own future, for better or worse.
